content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 400 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a more competitive offer. How about 550 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big gap, I think we can find a middle ground. I propose 475 euros per month. I am smart and dependable. I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but 475 euros is still not enough for me. I need a tenant who can afford to pay a fair price for the apartment. How about 525 euros per month? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. Since I am a dependable person, I will pay 500 euros per month. I will also fix any minor issues in the apartment myself.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 500 euros per month. My expenses are high, and I need a rent that reflects the value of the apartment. If you're willing to pay 525 euros per month, we have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 525 euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 525 euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
